attributes.action: DVSA should allow Keyworkers to take there driving tests.
attributes.additional_details:
DVSA is not allowing key workers to take their theory test or practical tests during the second lockdown. Key workers are exempt from taking their theory test and practical test during the second lockdown. How are they meant to continue offering services to the core infrastructure. 

Why have they changed the rules from the first lockdown? - Keyworkers was allowed to book there test. Why has it changed now. Moreover, these services must be available for keyworkers.
attributes.background: DVSA is not allowing key workers to take their theory test or practical tests during the second lockdown. Key workers are exempt from taking their theory test and practical test during the second lockdown. How are they meant to continue offering services to the core infrastructure.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Exempt driving tests and lessons from COVID-19 restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
